alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 1:01PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Local gusts to 70 mph possible for favored locations. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow is expected in open and exposed areas where snowpack exists. *ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of heavy snow will occur this evening between 5 PM and 11 PM. Visibility may be reduced to 1/4 mile at times due to falling and blowing snow. Blowing and drifting snow will continue through the rest of the night due to the strong winds, even after the snowfall has ended.
info.instruction: Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Use caution if you must drive.
